website_summaries.verdict: This air-filled tire and wheel assembly is manufactured to fit most 6-cubic foot wheelbarrows and yields a comfortable ride.
pros: The centered 3-inch hub allows you to mount the tire in either direction
The rugged design of the ribbed tire makes transporting a load of up to 400 pounds possible, while a convenient grease fitting allows bearings to roll smoothly
cons: Be sure to measure your hub accurately for a proper fit, as this model has a 3/4-inch axle bore

customer_reviews.title: Pack that Hub!
customer_reviews.text: Quality product for the money, even though they are a tube type tire. One suggestion during installation. I recommend to pack the hub with axle grease before putting it back on the spindle. I greased it through the zirc fitting thoroughly, then decided to check in inside of the hub again. After taking it apart, the hub was not full of grease as I anticipated. Pack that hub for better service.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Grevey

customer_reviews.title: Happy I placed this order from this merchant, Lawn Cart tires
customer_reviews.text: Really a good deal and quality. Was very pleased on how fast it was shipped and worked perfectly for my lawn tractor pull behind Craftsman lawn Cart. This had the 3/4 inch hub and worked perfectly. The tire and rim has a grease fitting which is great. Note, put grease on the alxe before putting on the rim and tire, then grease , spin tire a few times then grease again. Tires came prefilled with air also, was a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Great tire for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Opened box and was kind of suprised it looked exactly like the picture. May want to keep it in the garage it smells, it's obviously rubber. Perfect fit for my mower trailer. Doesn't come with securement cotter pin or eclip, no washers either so plan ahead depending on your application. I was able to just reuse washers and pin that was on the previous wheel. It comes inflated.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome tire
customer_reviews.text: Perfect tire for my wheel barrow. I purchased one tire to replace my damaged tire on my old wheel barrow. The wheels are well made and very responsibly priced. It’s a solid replacement and combine that with Amazons prices equals out to a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Mathers

customer_reviews.title: That they hold air
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these for my dual wheel, wheel barrow. worked as expected, however be very careful that you get the correct axle hole size. I ended up having to build a new axle for my barrow to make them work (used heavy duty zinc plated steel tube). Cut it to length, drilled holes in each end to accommodate cotter pins, and everything worked great. About an 1.5 hrs to complete including running to Home Depot for the zinc tubing. Also, make sure that you grease the axle bearings heavily on the new wheels as they have no grease in them when you receive them.
customer_reviews.author: Bill J

customer_reviews.title: Cart wheels will get you rollin right away.
customer_reviews.text: for the price of the two tires it is most convienent that you can slip these on your cart and not have to deal with actually removeing old tires and mounting new tires. " A" The concern is the bearings as they appear week, not sealed and are only supported on the outer and inner rim edge. the center of the wheel is open , not a solid shaft as origional equiptment. "C" (you will use a bit of grease on hollow shaft) Appear to be working ok since installing Useing these on a cart mounted to my lawn tractor.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Marathon industries 4.8/4.0-8 tires and wheels 16 inch, worked great on our lawn cart and sized for wheelbarrows too
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 of these marathon Industries wheels and tires for our lawn utility cart. I guess this size is a very popular one for lawn carts and wheelbarrows. This was the perfect size, straight shaft and 3/4 inch wheel bearing size. We have a Craftsman lawn cart and these 16 inch wheels and tire combo worked great! So happy that I am able to buy things like this online instead of having to run all over town looking for what I need. Great quality tires and wheels.
customer_reviews.author: J. Graham

customer_reviews.title: Bearing size
customer_reviews.text: Apparently a 3/4" bearing size does not necessarily equal a 3/4" axle size. New tire assembly was delivered quickly and the tire and tube are exactly the size I needed, but the wheel would not slide onto the axle of my trailer. I ended up de-mounting the tube and tire from the new rim and mounting them on the old one. Happy that the trailer is ready for use again, not happy with the effort it took to make it happen.
customer_reviews.author: tnscoutr

customer_reviews.title: Cheap bearings
customer_reviews.text: Price is good but the product is not. I put this tire/wheel combo on a pull behind cart and the poorly made bearings failed on the second load of mulch. The weight in the cart was around 80 pounds and I had proper wheel retaining washers installed. Ended up dismounting the tire and installing it on my old wheel, so I can say the tire is decent. Would not purchase again
customer_reviews.author: turbodiesel97

customer_reviews.title: Lasted less than 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I use these tires on my wood hauling cart, and it carries 4-500 pounds of unsplit firewood out of my woods. Unfortunately this application seems to be a bit too much for these tires (see photo). Funny, the original tires on my Sears 10 cu. ft. cart lasted a LOT longer than these are. This last one lasted less than 3 months. Wish I could find a wheel/tire combo that was a better fit for my needs but this is all I've been able to find. I guess they don't make 'em like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: R.Michael C.

customer_reviews.title: Marathon Wheelbarrow Tire Great Value
customer_reviews.text: In short, I don't know how Marathon can manufacture a quality rim and tire like this and have them sold at retail for $20. The question is how long the rubber tire will last out in the weather and still hold the proper air pressure. Be sure to measure your old tire. I used some 3/4" plastic plumbing pipe spacers to keep the wheel centered on my wheelbarrow axle.
customer_reviews.author: bobweb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect replacement for a blown tire
customer_reviews.text: So when I got a nail in my tire I actually went out and got a new tube and went through the effort to replace the old tube - but then the actual tire gave way. I searched on Amazon and found this and it is a great replacement so I replaced both of the tires on my little tractor. As of now, I'm very satisfied and it was a great price! Thanks! :)
customer_reviews.author: David Allen

customer_reviews.title: Works for Me but has issues.....
customer_reviews.text: Pros: I bought these for my Craftsman Pull Cart. Fit perfectly. Put on in 2 minutes. So far no flats. Cons: If you don't PACK this thing FULL of grease, the bearings WILL fall out. I mean FULL of grease too, not a few shots. It comes with NO GREASE. These wheels should have sealed bearings anyway. Other than the grease issue, they work great.
customer_reviews.author: Alphadog

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money. Do not buy. Awful bearings.
customer_reviews.text: The bearings/bushings are junk. Have had them on a small trailer for carrying brush. Have used the trailer about 9 times and noticed the wheels wobbling on the axles. When I took the wheels off one bushing has pushed through to the other side, ball bearings have fallen out, and they are just sitting there with the axle riding against the wheel. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: polyspecific

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: These wheels were ordered to replace flat tires that would no longer inflate due to rusted-out rims on a 20-year-old garden cart that I pull with my lawn tractor. They arrived quickly and were easily changed out within a few minutes. My cart is now as good as new and ready to haul grass - or any other yard stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jane M. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Bearings failed after a day of use
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of these to replace shredded tires on an Agri-Fab Dump Cart. They fit great. However, after about a day of use being towed around the yard, the bearings on both wheels failed. Now they just kind of flop around on the axle. Yes, I greased the bearings but no, they did not hold up when carrying a few hundred pounds of dirt. Extreme disappointment and $50 wasted on the pair of wheels. NOT RECOMMENDED.
customer_reviews.author: George P. Burdell

customer_reviews.title: Marathon 4.80/4.00-8" Pneumatic blowout
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a two wheel tow behind cart. Ran PSI as recommended. Lasted 1 year, hauled branches and leaves last year, then two tires started coming apart while hauling light loads of mulch behind the golf cart this spring. Looked nice at first and very easy to place on axles, I've just not seen anything like this especially both at the same time. Guess construction is very consistent. I'll purchase the 4.80 - 8 4 ply highway tire and mount on these rims. Cost per service hour might be way less.
customer_reviews.author: Lawnpros

customer_reviews.title: These or Flat Free?
customer_reviews.text: I replaced my tires because my old air filled tires rotted out. I assume these will do the same. If I had read the info on page 2 of Marathon's tire catalog, I would have paid the extra for the flat free tires. They have greater UV resistance. Here is a link to Marathon's tire catalog: [...]
customer_reviews.author: D. Sargent

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for garden trailer. Existing Wheels were 13 inches and these are 15. My concern at first was they would be too tall? As it turns out, after measuring and ordering, they are way nicer to have on this trailer than the 13 inch wheels. The trailer moves better and seems to take a better payload now.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph W.

customer_reviews.title: read the comments and take careful measurements so you won't be disappointed. Unless you're willing to go back to the ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for the log splitter. A couple of washers and 20 minutes later, the job was done. Before you order, read the comments and take careful measurements so you won't be disappointed. Unless you're willing to go back to the dealer and pay three times the price, a little ingenuity and know how can save you time and money. Tires arrived quickly, fully inflated and ready to mount. But, just like others commented, you may have to make a few minor adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: L. Stanley

customer_reviews.title: Blow-out
customer_reviews.text: Has all the specifications to be a good one for my purpose, replacement on Swisher pull-behind mower, made a few passes and thought I heard a shotgun go off behind me, loud!! The tire blew out! Says 400 lb load with 30 psi max, I had it at 30 or a little under with maybe 150 lb load on it.......
customer_reviews.author: Stevie T.

customer_reviews.title: Tire failed at 3 months of light use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this tire in late June this year. After 3 months, the bead has failed on the rim. I had installed it on a light cart, maybe held 200 pound load a few times Tire is now completely useless. CANNOT get the tire to reseat on rim. I don't recommend this tire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: replacement for small wagon. Comes with tire and rim, inner tube as well, complete inflated tire. I bought 2. Inner tube alone at brick and mortar store is 14.00.This is a deal
customer_reviews.author: phil13

customer_reviews.title: Lost Return
customer_reviews.text: The product itself was fine, it just didn't fit so I had to send it back. Ordered 2 wheels at the same time and both arrived together in one box. Printed a return lable and shipped both wheels back together in the same box they came in. Refund issued. Over a month later I get an email saying they only got one wheel, so I am going to be charged for the other one again! There was only one return lable to print and it even says quantity: 2. One star for crappy return service
customer_reviews.author: Marvin

customer_reviews.title: tires have have held up well in a year of use
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased I figure if they last the summer and the heavy use I would be happy, well they are still rolling around and have held up to 150 # without damage. Good tire for the money
customer_reviews.author: Komehameha

customer_reviews.title: Check your ri m width at the axle may be different on your wheelbarrow
customer_reviews.text: Great deal very happy with them. I need to warn you please check if these are for a wheelbarrow make sure that these rims are the right width. My wheelbarrow rims are about 4.5 in wide and these are about 2 inches wide so you may need some bushings.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 3/4 inch hub
customer_reviews.text: The delivery was quick and arrived as scheduled. The tires were replacements for those which came with a craftsman lawn mower cart. Most utility tires are 5/8 inch, so be sure to measure the hub before ordering, and if 3/4 inch hub is required this tire is a perfect fit. The width of the hub was also within specs and did not require washers.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed, good value
customer_reviews.text: Good quality tire! Will likely buy a couple more. I love to get good value for my money and I know you do, too. If you need a tire, this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Todd

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Install
customer_reviews.text: This tire and wheel kit was easy to swap out with the old tire. Job was complete in about 10 minutes using only standard hand tools.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Parkey

customer_reviews.title: Seems to be a good deal so far
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be a good deal so far. It is not the same exact size as the one I replaced, but I believe it is probably my fault. The old tire said 4.80-8" and this one said 4.80/4.00-8" and I thought they'd be the same. It is just a lawn mower trailer so it is no big deal, not like it'll be going down the road.
customer_reviews.author: K W

customer_reviews.title: For under $20 you can just start over.  Grease fitting included!
customer_reviews.text: A great deal for a replacement tire. My old tires had rotting rubber, rusting metal. I thought about buying a tube for $9 and installing it under the failed tire. It can be done but it's a PITA\. And you still have a rotting/rusting tire. For under $20 you can just start over. Grease fitting included!
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Best price for what they are.
customer_reviews.text: I put thes on my garden tractor trailer th replace one that I damaged. I bought 2 and so far they are what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: Merrill R. Mcalister

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfect for my utility trailer
customer_reviews.text: Fit right one and had no problems putting them on my little utility trailer. Actually better than the originals
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 2 Years
customer_reviews.text: Tires were shot after two years of very light use. Dry rotted and bearings fell apart even with regular greasing.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: 3/4" hub tires - Helped so much
customer_reviews.text: I've had a small lawnmower trailer in my yard for years. When a big tree fell, I needed the trailer and couldn't buy them in any of the national stores. These came ready to put on, went on easily and were excellent quality.
customer_reviews.author: D. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace a tire on a garden cart that finally went bad due to dry rot. It seems to work fine, although it seems to be a little narrower than than the tire that it replaced, although the specs are the same. It was reasonably priced, particularly since I did not have to to to the trouble to mount a tire on my old rim. I will get another one to replace when my other old tire when it croaks (which might not be too long.
customer_reviews.author: HK

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Made my lawn cart work like new again... wheels fit right on axel... Good for many years to come....
customer_reviews.author: John Stover

customer_reviews.title: Junk.
customer_reviews.text: Tires are not symmetrical. Rubber is cut poorly. Grease fittings snapped off. Likely fake and counterfeit Chinese junk.
customer_reviews.author: Devon

customer_reviews.title: Exact fit
customer_reviews.text: Very nice ,cheaper to buy rim and tire together. I watched the price until i got then for around $20-$25 each
customer_reviews.author: josh

customer_reviews.title: They work..
customer_reviews.text: They arrived with the prescribed air pressure, exactly, so I guess that means they aren't leaking so far. The zerk fittings and valve stems work well and the bearings are smooth and quiet. But, I've only had them a couple of weeks......... I think they are going to be worth more than they cost so I'm pleased, so far..........
customer_reviews.author: chuck diver

customer_reviews.title: Great tires
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the refurbished lawn cart - towed behind the lawn tractor/mower. Comes with grease alamites - a must for a non-bearing type wheel. Keeps friction at a minimum on the axle and rust out. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: J. Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our small utility trailer
customer_reviews.text: This was the tire we needed for our little trailer I tow behind our ATV for cleaning up our property. Price was better than local stores.
customer_reviews.author: D. Aldrich

customer_reviews.title: making it better than the original
customer_reviews.text: This replaced the old dry-rotted tire on my wagon with no problems.. No modifications required. It even has a grease fitting, making it better than the original. I'll probably be buying a second one to replace the other side soon...
customer_reviews.author: W. Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Worked great on my old cart that I threw out the ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my old cart that I threw out the old tires and wheel. Fit was easy and lubing a breeze. Will be putting in extended grease zerts though, the ones included are a little short for my taste once the are on the cart.
customer_reviews.author: Vaughn

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are fine, rubber is not.
customer_reviews.text: The wheels themselves are fine: The're for a small, reclaimed two-wheel ATV trailer. The previous wheels weren't salvageable. But it's only been 10 months of light duty, and already the tire rubber is splitting and one of the valves has a slow leak. I'll buy replacement tubes and tires, but they certainly won't say Made in China this time.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey Munroe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get the tire on the axle but the problem was on my end. The axle had a burr on it which would not allow the tire to slide on. Once I filed down the burr the tire fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Jan e Paquin

customer_reviews.title: Tire is fine and does the job on my lawn cart
customer_reviews.text: Tire is fine and does the job on my lawn cart. Didn't like the packaging. Was in a huge box with one small piece of packing paper. Must have rattled around like a bb in a boxcar. Arrived but the box was not in good shape.
customer_reviews.author: wardblvd

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for the larger axle
customer_reviews.text: Fit perfectly on my Garden cart. Grease certs were a great addition. these should last a lot longer than the orignals.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer45612e

customer_reviews.title: Bearings self destructed under a month of use
customer_reviews.text: Seemed like a good value and fit fine By three weeks both bearings had self destructed--just came completely apart then wallered out--exceptionally cheap worthless "metal" Save your money and get hard steel hubs with heavy duty bearings. Worthless describes my experience with this product. Serendipitymike
customer_reviews.author: Michael M.

customer_reviews.title: First pair fell apart
customer_reviews.text: I bought these tire for a lawnmower cart I made, a big one! They were used fairly hard use and fell apart. I'm on my second pair. I don't really know of any other options or I would likely try another brand but all in all they did they job. They do fit perfectly on the 5/8 axle they are supposed to fit on.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Tires... Just what I needed to get my cart moving again.
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install. Came ready to install and use. LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Replacement Wheels
customer_reviews.text: The wheels arrived on time and were as described. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: donnyjoe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Cost-Effective Buy
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding cost effective product. Was pleasantly surprised to see ball bearings and grease fittings on these wheels. Mounted on a pull-behind dump-trailer and couldn't be more pleased. Fast service and ready to roll!
customer_reviews.author: William Bass

customer_reviews.title: Sent wrong tire
customer_reviews.text: One of the tires was a 4.80/4.00-8, flat free on wheel 3" hub, 5/8 bearing, ribbed tread. Part #00065.
customer_reviews.author: David R Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Fits Crafstman yard/dump trailer, easy replacement, great price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for craftsman yard/dump trailer. 2 minute job to replace both tires. Have grease fitting which many do not. Great price. Let’s see how they wear over time. Looked all over locally for them to no avail.
customer_reviews.author: What’s the Frequency, Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: worked and a good price
customer_reviews.text: 3" hub is more like 3.5". I had to resize bushings on the axle.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tire for garden cart
customer_reviews.text: Excellent tire. Perfect fit for garden trailer. Have loaded 700 lbs in trailer and no problem with tire. Also has fitting for greasing. Perfect
customer_reviews.author: dennis cledgett

customer_reviews.title: Dirt cheap for a reason...
customer_reviews.text: This would be a suitable replacement for a child’s toy. Any side load stresses the cheap, pressed in bearing, as others have eluded to. Early failure guaranteed I took a chance, sue me. 12 bux to return the pair. Expensive gamble. Don’t.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Will do the job.
customer_reviews.text: Worked like they should. Mailed quickly. Has grease zerk for quick lube.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent tires with a surprise
customer_reviews.text: The tires are just what I needed. They went on easily and came with a little something extra. Each has a fitting for a grease gun to make periodic maintenance much easier.
customer_reviews.author: THOMAS A HIDAY

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: It came as advertised and fit my application well. I would buy it gain.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: functional and value priced
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit for my craftsman yard trailer and a lot cheaper than Sears price and probably the same item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tires, great value!
customer_reviews.text: These wheels were a perfect fit for my seats yard cart. Great Value!
customer_reviews.author: harry McIntyre

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate buying this tire.
customer_reviews.text: Very good tire complete with a grease fitting. I purchased 1 some time ago to replace one on my tractor cart that wore out. The second tire wore out months later and I purchased the second one without hesitation.I know I'll be able to go years with these tires, my problems are solved. A great plus is it's shipped buy Amazon and it arrives in 2 days.
customer_reviews.author: William Dickson

customer_reviews.title: 4.80/4.00-8 Tire
customer_reviews.text: Received product in excellent time. I immediately installed it on my yard implement. I used Jacks grease to lubricate the axle prior to installation. I like this lubrication because it does not break down with moisture. I will add grease via the zerk fitting on the new wheel.
customer_reviews.author: BigBob

customer_reviews.title: No brainer!
customer_reviews.text: The original tires on my lawn tractor cart were worn out! Do I buy just the tire and assume that I can put it on the old rims without getting aggravated or do I spend a few more dollars and get new rims that aren't banged up and tires that are already blown up, one cotter pin away from success? No brainer! What would have been a two day job was a 2 minute job.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia A Borst

customer_reviews.title: A good purchase, Amazon delivered in one day
customer_reviews.text: Put them on an old Craftsman steel cart with 5/8 inch axle, ball bearings with inner tube, will carry a lot of weight, very well made. A good purchase, Amazon delivered in one day.
customer_reviews.author: Airbear41

customer_reviews.title: were a good value
customer_reviews.text: they were a good price, they did not work for my application, however they would be great for garden carts and such for around a property,
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Surprised how cheap n easy replacing my wheel barrow wheels was. Very sturdy. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Beki

customer_reviews.title: Bearings disintegrated after 1.5 years.
customer_reviews.text: Wheels mounted easily on a Sear's dump cart. Worked well for about a year and a half, then the bearings totally disintegrated. Bought replacement 3/4" bearings but they didn't fit due to a lip on the hub. Tires are still good... for nothing. Will try to find better replacements.
customer_reviews.author: Gwoone

customer_reviews.title: Tire was good.... we didn't know we would need rods as well.
customer_reviews.text: The tire was great... wish we knew we needed the rods. Given that these belong to wheelbarrows...possibly all the needed parts should come with it or stipulate that possible rods will be needed as well and supply them on the same page.
customer_reviews.author: maryann2h

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Replacements!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace the tires on a CRAFTSMAN Cart/Dump Cart Attachment. The recommended tires for replacement are $41.41 so these were a steal. They went on super easy and work great! I will continue to buy these as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Rust

customer_reviews.title: BUY
customer_reviews.text: BETTER THAN ORDERING JUST A TIRE. CHEAPER TOO IF YOU PAY FOR MOUNTING OF TIRE.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tires for my yard trailer
customer_reviews.text: Great tires for my yard trailer, Couldn't find them at the big box hardware stores or even freight or tool stores. These even have grease fittings to lube the wheel bearing. Came mounted and had air in them which allowed me to install them in less than 10 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Leo

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These came ready to put on our wagon. They are a great product and excellent value. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine White

customer_reviews.title: Make sure bore of wheel is what it says it is!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 2 tires with 3/4” bore. Actual diameter of the sleeve bore was 11/16” and would not fit on a 3/4” shaft. Could not get wheel onto shaft.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Frauenhoffer

customer_reviews.title: Great tires, easy to install.  Perfect replacement wheels for my garden trailer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase and with how easy they were to install. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Mel B Bad

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These were for a lawn cart with a 3/4" hub. Good quality and I don't have to deal with putting new tires on rusty,leaky rims.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bones

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than local.
customer_reviews.text: Good so far. We'll see if they dry rot in three years like all tires in this group...
customer_reviews.author: John M.

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: For what I paid I expected a tire and wheel that would be of average quality. What I received is just great. Bearing grease cap, valve stem cover, and a excellent wheel with a tire that will last for years. I tagged this purchase for when I'll need another.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry S

customer_reviews.title: Easy
customer_reviews.text: Bearing is a little cheap but still about the same price as a tube and tire and you don't have to fight it.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Shipped on time. But the tire is thinner and ...
customer_reviews.text: Shipped on time. But the tire is thinner and smaller diameter than my original. And yes the tire sizes both match. So now I'm going to have a lopsided trailer or I have to buy another tire to match the other side.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Check your local farm supply store.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for my little lawn tractor-dump trailer. I did have to replace a grease fitting in 1 of the pair I bought. The one installed at the factory (3rd world sweatshop) was broken and fell apart when I tried to attach my grease gun to it. My only other complaint is 1 week after receiving these I found them on sale locally at 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: Bubba

customer_reviews.title: Great, solid wheel.
customer_reviews.text: We love finding wheels for sale online, as my husband needs them in his repair line of work. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah J. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: fits, and functions
customer_reviews.text: not much to say... fit my garden/lawn/yard cart that tows behind my mower. if it fails in any way i will update this review.
customer_reviews.author: wezzz

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2, bearings failed on 1 very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: Bearings lasted only a month or so. They pushed right out of their seat.
customer_reviews.author: EdStein

customer_reviews.title: Working
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 of these for a garden trailer that pulls behind a riding mower. They are holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Servant of the Most High.

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than local
customer_reviews.text: Solid tires are better but this fit my immediate need for the least cost.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Glancy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect tire for my yard trailer
customer_reviews.text: Nice tire and wheels for replacing the ones on my yard trailer. The 4.8 was an upgrade for me from the 4.3's that were originally on the trailer. This allows for heavier loads and raises the trailer up a little more above grade. Perfect fit - great buy!
customer_reviews.author: marcus38

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cart tire
customer_reviews.text: Easy to get the whole wheel assembly. Hopefully it will last long that oem tire. The material seems better quality, and has it has a grease fitting.
customer_reviews.author: JAK Krow

customer_reviews.title: ok if you dont use much
customer_reviews.text: these only worked on my cart for a week before the bearings gave out.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: GREAT DEAL!
customer_reviews.text: OMG.....GREAT item and perfect. Tire and rim together, beats shopping all over town. Thanks......happy, picking up sticks in the yard!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Fits a 3/4 inch shaft. Just what I needed for my lawn mower pulled two wheel dump cart.
customer_reviews.author: Teddy Howell

customer_reviews.title: Easy and ready to go
customer_reviews.text: Loved this! Very easy to install. Did not take long to arrive. Just put the new tires on and grease. Ready to GO!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Linda Luebbering

customer_reviews.title: The roll and smell like rubber. They come pre-inflated
customer_reviews.text: They are trailer tires. Not much else to say. The roll and smell like rubber. They come pre-inflated. They do have grease fittings installed so you can grease the axle after you put them on your lawn trailer or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Master

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Only really needed a tire but this combination was just a few dollars more for the wheel tire and tube.
customer_reviews.author: RIck Vander Weide

customer_reviews.title: both of the tire assy fail to hold air pressure
customer_reviews.text: they where installed on wheel barrows. REPLACEMENTS WHERE INSTALL ED, AND ONLY ONE STARTED TO LEAK AFTER A WEEK. I NEE TO BUY A TUBE.
customer_reviews.author: richiesgarage

customer_reviews.title: Great wheel!
customer_reviews.text: Fit our older wheelbarrow like a charm. To think, I almost paid 2x more for this very wheel in Lowes! I'm glad I checked amazon! DO check for width of axle. I had to cut a piece of PVC in order to get it the right distance off of the center.
customer_reviews.author: J T

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Adds renewed usability to my 35 year old garden cart. Perfect fit, exact replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Silver Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Good product for the money
customer_reviews.text: Good product for the money. Upon greasing after installation, the grease fitting on one of the tires broke off. Easy fix and expected for what I paid.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

product_meta.title: Marathon 4.80/4.00-8" Pneumatic (Air Filled) Tire on Wheel, 3" Hub, 3/4" Bearings, Ribbed Tread
product_meta.description: Size:Pack of 1| Color:WhiteMarathon Industries 20063 4.80/4.00-8" Pneumatic (air filled) wheelbarrow tire with ribbed tread - 3"" Centered hub - 3/4"- bearings - 15.5" Tire diameter. Bearings can be changed out if different size needed.
feature_bullets: 3" Centered hub. 3/4" Ball bearing. Check your existing tire for measurements, bearing and Hub Size for proper fit.
Perfect for contractor wheelbarrows. Most common For 6 cubic foot wheelbarrow.
400 lb Load capacity. Inflate with Manual pump only. Not for highway use.
